body.p:
The requires access to the following file resources:
READ access to the directory where the is deployed.
READ and WRITE access to the application's working directory.
READ and WRITE access to JVM's temporary directory.
It is a good security practice to allow a component to access only the information and resources that are necessary for its purpose.

section.title: Enabling Security Mode
section.p: To enable security mode, use the following procedure, depending on your installation method:

dlentry.dd: If you installed using one of the installation kits (All Platforms, Linux, or Windows), you can enable security mode by setting the following system property: -Djava.security.manager.

p.note: In the previous example, replace oxygenxml-web-author with the name of your deployment of .

section.title: Configuring File Permissions to Custom Locations
section.p: There are cases when the needs to access files system resources, but due to security reasons, you want to prevent your users from opening them directly in the editing page using the file:// protocol.
